name: Chess Knight 2
description:
Chess Knight 2 is the classic board game of Chess reimagined for the casual gamer looking to learn and to grow with the most popular game in history. A medieval world of strategy and tactics await you to engage in epic battles of wits as you master the moves and the strategies in a conquest to claim the kingdom of Chess. Learn to play in this fun, colorful and intuitive download offering multiple levels of difficulty. You can play in top-down 2D or fully animated 3D mode in a challenge against the computer or a good friend or relative. An introduction to Chess is included and the visual guide to legal moves provides help if you are stuck!KEY FEATURES
  • 2D & 3D gameplay
  • Single- and two-player mode
  • 4 levels of difficulty
  • Unique animated Chess pieces
  • Undo recent moves
  • Visual guide to legal moves
  • Introduction to Chess
